title: How to Prepare Fake Formula for Your Reborn Baby Doll

steps.title: You can get them at thrift, dollar, and grocery stores.
steps.content: You can get them at thrift, dollar, and grocery stores.

steps.title: Fill it to line 4 if you want to make a fresh bottle.
steps.content: Fill it to line 4 if you want to make a fresh bottle. If you want it to look like the baby has already been drinking, fill the bottle to line 2.

steps.title: Mix the lotion and water thoroughly.
steps.content: Mix the lotion and water thoroughly.

steps.title: Drop the food coloring on a cotton swab.
steps.content: Drop the food coloring on a cotton swab. Then, swirl the cotton swab into the lotion and water mixture a few times. If you don't have yellow food coloring, use vanilla extract.

steps.title: Give it a good shake so the ingredients mix evenly.
steps.content: Give it a good shake so the ingredients mix evenly. Then, feed the formula to your hungry reborn baby!
